original_text: And the man that lieth with his father's wife hath uncovered his father's nakedness: both of them shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
korean_text: 누구든지 그의 아버지의 아내와 동침하는 자는 그의 아버지의 하체를 범하였은즉 둘 다 반드시 죽일지니 그들의 피가 자기들에게로 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: that lieth with his father's wife
both of them shall surely be put to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘은 반드시 죽임을 당할 것이며

sentences.original_text: their blood shall be upon them
